original_title: If You Don't Try, Nothing Ever Happens
overview: In 1993, Washington DC area indie rock band Lorelei went on tour to England, before even their first EP had been released (only a single so far). It's not Spinal Tap, but things did not go as planned for the band. The doc mixes performance footage with some on-the-road moments.
title: If You Don't Try, Nothing Ever Happens
